pizzas.title: Margherita
pizzas.description: Classic Neapolitan pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

pizzas.title: Pepperoni
pizzas.description: Traditional pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and slices of spicy pepperoni.

pizzas.title: BBQ Chicken
pizzas.description: Delicious pizza with barbecue sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, and cilantro.

pizzas.title: Vegetarian
pizzas.description: A pizza loaded with fresh vegetables like bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, and olives.

pizzas.title: Meat Lovers
pizzas.description: For meat enthusiasts, this pizza is topped with a variety of meats like pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham.

pizzas.title: Hawaiian
pizzas.description: A controversial yet delicious combination of ham, pineapple, and mozzarella cheese on a pizza.

pizzas.title: Mushroom and Olive
pizzas.description: Pizza topped with saut√©ed mushrooms, black olives, mozzarella cheese, and a sprinkle of herbs.

pizzas.title: Four Cheese
pizzas.description: A cheese lover's delight with a blend of mozzarella, cheddar, feta, and gorgonzola cheeses.

pizzas.title: Supreme
pizzas.description: An all-in-one pizza with a variety of toppings, including pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, and olives.

pizzas.title: Spinach and Feta
pizzas.description: A vegetarian delight topped with fresh spinach, feta cheese, onions, and garlic.

pizzas.title: Buffalo Cauliflower
pizzas.description: A vegetarian twist on buffalo chicken pizza, featuring spicy buffalo cauliflower, ranch dressing, and mozzarella cheese.

pizzas.title: Paneer Tikka
pizzas.description: An Indian-inspired pizza topped with spicy paneer tikka, bell peppers, onions, and a tangy sauce.

pizzas.title: Veggie Feast
pizzas.description: A veggie-loaded pizza with a variety of colorful vegetables like tomatoes, bell peppers, corn, olives, and mushrooms.

pizzas.title: Jalapeno Popper
pizzas.description: A spicy and cheesy pizza topped with cream cheese, jalapenos, cheddar cheese, and bacon bits.

pizzas.title: Artichoke and Tomato
pizzas.description: A flavorful combination of marinated artichoke hearts, sun-dried tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and pesto sauce.

pizzas.title: Vegan BBQ Jackfruit
pizzas.description: A vegan pizza featuring tangy barbecue jackfruit, red onions, bell peppers, and dairy-free cheese.

pizzas.title: Caprese
pizzas.description: A light and refreshing pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and balsamic glaze.

pizzas.title: Greek
pizzas.description: An authentic Greek pizza with toppings like feta cheese, kalamata olives, red onions, and tzatziki sauce.

pizzas.title: Paneer Makhani
pizzas.description: A rich and creamy pizza topped with paneer (Indian cottage cheese), buttery tomato sauce, and Indian spices.

pizzas.title: Truffle Mushroom
pizzas.description: A gourmet pizza featuring truffle oil, assorted mushrooms, mozzarella cheese, and fresh thyme.

pizzas.title: Mexican Fiesta
pizzas.description: A pizza packed with Mexican flavors, topped with seasoned ground beef, black beans, jalapenos, and salsa.

pizzas.title: Quattro Stagioni
pizzas.description: A traditional Italian pizza divided into four sections with different toppings, including artichokes, ham, mushrooms, and olives.

pizzas.title: Spicy Paneer
pizzas.description: An Indian-inspired pizza featuring spicy paneer, bell peppers, onions, and a tangy tomato sauce.

pizzas.title: Vegan Garden
pizzas.description: A vegan-friendly pizza loaded with a variety of fresh vegetables, including tomatoes, bell peppers, onions, and mushrooms.

pizzas.title: Pesto and Sundried Tomato
pizzas.description: A delightful pizza topped with basil pesto, sundried tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and a sprinkle of pine nuts.
